vote.title: Authorize (1) an increase in the construction services contracts for job order contract with Nouveau Construction and Technology Services, L.P. to continue to provide additional construction services at Stemmons Municipal Center located at 7800 North Stemmons Freeway job order contacting services at City facilities; and (2) an increase in appropriations in an amount not to exceed $124,420.78 in the Building Inspection Fund - Not to exceed $124,420.78, from $456,586.99 to $581,007.77 - Financing: Building Inspection Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize (1) an increase in the construction services contracts for job order contract with Nouveau Construction and Technology Services, L.P. to continue to provide additional construction services at Stemmons Municipal Center located at 7800 North Stemmons Freeway job order contacting services at City facilities; and (2) an increase in appropriations in an amount not to exceed $124,420.78 in the Building Inspection Fund - Not to exceed $124,420.78, from $456,586.99 to $581,007.77 - Financing: Building Inspection Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
